siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: Display type determines how to display the value in different parts of a dashboard or in the notification. There are 4 available display values: string numberâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
Display type determines how to display the value in different parts of a dashboard or in the notification. There are 4 available display values:

  1. string
  2. number
  3. base
  4. percent

Number, base and percent types have additional display settings and value range settings.
